title: JPMorgan CEO warns we’re living in ‘the most dangerous times’
author: Vinicius Barbosa
excerpt: In times of pandemics and wars, the economy is facing meaningful challenges worldwide with unprecedented inflation growth, national debt accumulation, interest rate hikes, and liquidity crises. Many of the proposed solutions that worked before, under better conditions, are not accomplishing the expected results, and experts struggle to find the right path to follow.

title: Hong Kong’s crypto index creator ditches USDC to onboard XRP
author: Vinicius Barbosa
excerpt: Financial indexes are numeric scores that assist investors in following consolidated data on different markets or sectors, usually weighted by specific rules or the importance each index manager sees for each asset composing its basket.

title: Ferrari to officially accept crypto as payment for its supercars
author: Justinas Baltrusaitis
excerpt: In a groundbreaking move, luxury sports car manufacturer Ferrari has announced its decision to accept cryptocurrency as a form of payment for its vehicles in the United States, with plans to extend this payment option to Europe in the near future.

title: Plan trading Bitcoin next week? Here’s what you should know
author: Vinicius Barbosa
excerpt: Bitcoin (BTC) had a negative past week regarding its price action. With a retrace starting on October 7, after a previous consolidation week that followed an uptrend since September 11. In the past seven days, BTC lost around 4% of its market value, until the time of publication.

title: National security concerns emerge over Chinese Bitcoin mine in Wyoming
author: Justinas Baltrusaitis
excerpt: National security concerns have been raised over a Chinese Bitcoin (BTC) mining operation in Cheyenne, Wyoming, and stakeholders believe it could pose a significant threat to critical military infrastructure in the United States.

title: HopeCard public beta goes live connecting Web2 and Web3 for crypto users
author: Jordan Major
excerpt: The HopeCard, a protocol integrated into the HOPE Ecosystem, serves as a mediator between Web2 and Web3 platforms, facilitating cryptocurrency transactions for global users.

title: XRP faces critical support test as market volatility persists
author: Jordan Major
excerpt: XRP, one of the prominent names in the cryptocurrency landscape, is currently undergoing a significant market test.

title: XRP community calls out US government over terror financing allegations
author: Ana Zirojevic
excerpt: Update (October 13): On Friday, a Warburg Pincus representative reached out to Finbold to clarify, stating, “Warburg Pincus is not an investor in Genesis.”

title: Axie Infinity massive token unlock ahead; What’s next for AXS?
author: Vinicius Barbosa
excerpt: Axie Infinity (AXS) positioned itself among the leading and most popular ‘play-to-earn’ blockchain games during 2021’s gaming mania in the cryptocurrency market. The project gathered hundreds of thousands of players, attracting investors and speculators due to its financial nature.

title: Crypto doom: Market crash erases $56 billion from top coins
author: Vinicius Barbosa
excerpt: In another volatile period driven by bearish financial news, the cryptocurrency market has faced another red week, with most projects registering meaningful losses in the last seven days, despite a few cryptocurrencies outperforming the vast majority with extraordinary gains.
